user.title: Rendez hommage à votre proche disparu
user.text: Cet espace d'intimité rassemble les proches de {{{capitalize firstname}}} et vous permet de partager un message, un souvenir ou une photo.

user.title: Prenez connaissance du déroulé des obsèques
user.text: Vous trouverez dans cet espace les informations relatives au déroulé des obsèques.

user.title: Faites un geste pour {{{capitalize firstname}}} et offrez du soutien
user.text: En envoyant des fleurs sur le lieux des obsèques ou en contribuant à une cause chère au défunt.

user.title: Invitez les personnes chères à {{{capitalize firstname}}}
user.text: Partagez cet espace avec les proches du défunt désireux de se recueillir et lui rendre hommage.

manager.title: Découvrez un espace intime d’hommage et de partage
manager.text: Rendez hommage à {{{capitalize firstname}}} sur cet espace intime et sécurisé. Vous avez la main et décidez qui peut y accéder.

manager.title: Communiquez les détails logistiques simplement
manager.text: Communiquez à vos proches les informations relatives aux obsèques en leur partageant cet espace en un clic.

manager.title: Offrez à vos proches un espace de commémoration consacré
manager.text: Vos proches pourront partager un message ou une photo et faire livrer des fleurs sur le lieux des obsèques.

manager.title: Gardez la trace des messages reçus
manager.text: En imprimant un livre qui compile tous les messages partagés sur cet espace par votre entourage.

delete-memory.message: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

login.err-swap: Ce lien n'est plus valide ! Veuillez vous identifier à nouveau.

start.title: You are not connected
start.subtitle: This space is private. Please enter your email address to access the different sections of the site.

swap.title: Thank you!
swap.subtitle: We just emailed you a link to reconnect to the space.

start.subtitle: This space is private. Please log in to access the site.
The messages are private. Please log in to access the site.
The messages are private. Please log in to access the site.
The settings are private. Please log in to access the site.

card-help.subtitle: Invite a close one to become a page administrator by your side to help you share it to those around you

steps.label: Order a book
steps.title: Book presentation
steps.subtitle: This book brings together all the messages and photos shared by your loved ones.

steps.label: My cart
steps.title: My cart
steps.subtitle: Here is your selection. You can change the quantity if you wish.

steps.label: Shipping
steps.title: Delivery address
steps.subtitle: Fill in the information necessary for delivery. Delivery will be made within 6 weeks (in Europe only).

steps.label: Payment
steps.title: Finalize the order
steps.subtitle: Fill in your banking information in the secure space below.

steps.title: Thank you for your order
steps.subtitle: Your order has been completed and a confirmation email has been sent to you.

steps.label: Choice of bouquet
steps.title: Choose your bouquet
steps.subtitle: All bouquets are medium in size and supplied with a bubble of water so that they can be delivered to the place of the funeral of your choice.

steps.label: My cart
steps.title: My cart
steps.subtitle: Here is your selection. You can change the quantity if you wish.

steps.label: Shipping
steps.title: Choose the place of delivery
steps.subtitle: Please select the delivery location of your choice. Our partner agrees to deliver before the time of the ceremony.

steps.label: Payment
steps.title: Finalize the order
steps.subtitle: Enter your bank information in the secure space below.

steps.title: Thank you for your order
steps.subtitle: Your order has been completed and a confirmation email has been sent to you.

labels.message: Add a message to your bouquet (optional):

ph.message: Enter your message (it will be attached to the bouquet)

steps.label: Your donation
steps.title: Your donation
steps.subtitle: Please select the amount you wish to donation to the association {{org}}.

steps.label: Payment
steps.title: Finalize your donation
steps.subtitle: Enter your bank information in the secure space below.

steps.title: Thank you for your generosity
steps.subtitle: Your contribution has been taken into account and a confirmation email has been sent to you.

steps.subtitle: Collecting donations allows your loved ones to support a specific cause or to contribute to the funeral

steps.subtitle: Who will be the beneficiary of this collection?

steps.subtitle: To collect money on the Internet, the law requires that the organizer is identified and provides the following information.

Your fundraiser has been closed.

tips.title: Activate your fundraiser
tips.subtitle: for the benefit of a cause or to finance the funeral.

tips.title: Your close ones make a donation
tips.subtitle: and show their support by contributing to a meaningful cause.

tips.title: Close your fundraiser
tips.subtitle: and receive the money by transfer to your bank account.

tips.title: Transfer funds to the chosen cause
tips.subtitle: and distribute a tax receipt to those who wish.

labels.beneficiary: Who is the beneficiary of the funds?

notes.message: This message is visible to your loved ones and allows you to say more about the cause supported.
notes.iban: The account into which the funds will be paid to you
notes.documents: Please add your identity documents. (Driver license or passport. Front and back.)
notes.close: The funds collected are transferred automatically to your bank account once a week, on Mondays, as long as the collection is not closed.
notes.closed: The total amount of the collection ({{stats.donations.total_f}}) will be transferred to the bank account {{donation.iban}} within 48 hours.

warning.documents: Make sure to match the address given above with the address on your ID, or you may have to provide another proof of address.
warning.files: Only images in .PNG or .JPEG / .JPG format of size less than 5MB are accepted.
warning.close: Please send your proof of identity to be able to close this collection of donations.

family: For those who wish to participate, we organized a collection of donations in memory of {{{capitalize firstname}}}.
org:
We know that the association {{org}} was very important to {{{capitalize firstname}}}. It is important to us to support their mission by setting up a fundraiser.

Many thanks for your participation.

steps.subtitle: Please enter here the information relating to the deceased.

steps.label: Your contact information
steps.title: Your contact information
steps.subtitle: Today or tomorrow, our team will contact you to answer any questions.

steps.title: Welcome!
steps.subtitle: Your space in honor of {{fullname}} has been created.

labels.name: Name of the deceased
labels.terms1: By clicking on confirm, you agree to our
labels.success:
Thank you! The space in tribute to 
 {{fullname}} has been created.

edit-profile.title: Information relating to your loved one
edit-profile.subtitle: Add a photo of your loved one and modify their information if necessary.

ph.lastname: Last name of your loved one

edit-intro.title: Notice of passing
edit-intro.subtitle: The text below allows you to address everyone invited to the space.
templates:
Dear family, dear friends,
We are very sad to announce the death of {{{capitalize firstname}}} {{# if dod}} which occurred last {{dod}} {{/ if}} {{# if age}} at the age of {{age}} years {{/ if}}. 

This InMemori page is intended to collect your testimonials: a message, a memory or a photo, illustrating a moment you shared with {{{capitalize firstname}}}.

The information about the funeral is shown below. Thank you for your support.

edit-places.title: Add event(s)
edit-places.subtitle: Complete the funeral here by adding the different ceremonies.

ph.name: Your first name and last name

menu.title: Thank you for your words!
menu.subtitle: Your message will be visible to everyone who has access to this space.

menu.title: Condolences
menu.subtitle: Express your feelings of support with {{{capitalize firstname}}}'s family.

menu.title: Memories
menu.subtitle: Share a moment lived with {{{capitalize firstname}}}.

menu.title: Photos
menu.subtitle: The space becomes prettier with pictures.

card-ft-book.title: The book
card-ft-book.text: Keep a physical trace of all the messages shared on InMemori

card-ft-flower.title: Flowers
card-ft-flower.text: Send flowers to the funeral place

card-ft-donation-unset.title: Give your loved ones the opportunity to contribute to a cause dear to the deceased
card-ft-donation-unset.text: Activating a fundraiser will allow your loved ones to support a specific cause or to help pay for the funeral

tab-share.title: Share
tab-share.subtitle: Help the family inform everyone who knew {{{capitalize firstname}}}

email.title: Email
email.subtitle: Share the announcement with everyone close to the deceased. They will have access to the space of {{{capitalize firstname}}}.

sms.title: SMS
sms.subtitle: You will receive by SMS the link of the space of {{{capitalize firstname}}}, to forward to your loved ones.
sms.cta: Send me the link by sms

wa.title: Whatsapp
wa.subtitle: Share the link via the Whatsapp app.

message.email:
Hello, 

It is with great sadness that we announce the death of {{fullname}}.

We share with you this private InMemori space on the internet to pay tribute to {{{capitalize firstname}}}. By going to space you can : 

- See the funeral information
- Share a condolence message, a memory and/or a photo

We appreciate your messages of support in these difficult times.

In order to include everyone who knew {{{capitalize firstname}}}, please share this space with them.

Friendships.

tab-infos.promo: The funeral is being organized by {{{name}}}.{{#if phone}} {{phone}}{{/if}}

managers-add.title: Add more administrators
managers-add.subtitle: Enter the email address of the people you want to invite as manager(s).
managers-add.message:
Hello,

I added you as administrator of the InMemori space in tribute to {{{capitalize firstname}}} so that you can help me personalize and manage it. 

Geraldine from InMemori is at our disposal for any questions and can be reached at (617) 858 4572 or by email at contact@inmemori.com.

managers-list.title: Managers
managers-list.subtitle: The administrators are the managers of this space. Click on "Add an administrator" to invite someone by email.
